title: JoyfulJay Feature Schema
description: Schema for encrypted traffic feature extraction outputs

connection.conn_dst_betweenness.description: Betweenness centrality of destination node in connection graph

connection.conn_dst_clustering.description: Clustering coefficient of destination node in connection graph

connection.conn_dst_community.description: Community identifier of destination node from community detection

connection.conn_dst_in_degree.direction_semantics: In-degree of destination node in connection graph
connection.conn_dst_in_degree.description: In-degree of destination node in the connection graph

connection.conn_dst_total_bytes.description: Total bytes received by destination IP across all flows

connection.conn_dst_total_flows.description: Total number of inbound flows to destination IP

connection.conn_dst_total_packets.description: Total packets received by destination IP across all flows

connection.conn_dst_unique_srcs.description: Number of unique source IPs contacting destination

connection.conn_same_community.direction_semantics: Whether source and destination are in same community
connection.conn_same_community.description: True if source and destination are in the same community

connection.conn_src_betweenness.description: Betweenness centrality of source node in connection graph

connection.conn_src_clustering.description: Clustering coefficient of source node in connection graph

connection.conn_src_community.description: Community identifier of source node from community detection

connection.conn_src_dst_flows.direction_semantics: Flows between this exact src-dst pair
connection.conn_src_dst_flows.description: Number of flows between this exact source-destination pair

connection.conn_src_out_degree.direction_semantics: Out-degree of source node in connection graph
connection.conn_src_out_degree.description: Out-degree of source node in the connection graph

connection.conn_src_port_flows.direction_semantics: Flows from source to this specific port
connection.conn_src_port_flows.description: Number of flows from source to this specific destination port

connection.conn_src_total_bytes.description: Total bytes sent by source IP across all flows

connection.conn_src_total_flows.description: Total number of outbound flows from source IP

connection.conn_src_total_packets.description: Total number of packets sent by source IP across all flows

connection.conn_src_unique_dsts.description: Number of unique destination IPs contacted by source

connection.conn_src_unique_ports.description: Number of unique destination ports contacted by source

dns.dns_additional_count.description: Count of additional records in DNS response

dns.dns_answer_count.description: Count of answer records in DNS response

dns.dns_authority_count.description: Count of authority records in DNS response

dns.dns_detected.direction_semantics: Whether DNS protocol was detected in the flow
dns.dns_detected.description: Boolean indicating DNS traffic was detected

dns.dns_is_query.direction_semantics: Whether the parsed DNS packet was a query

dns.dns_is_response.direction_semantics: Whether the parsed DNS packet was a response

dns.dns_max_ttl.direction_semantics: Maximum TTL value from answer records
dns.dns_max_ttl.description: Maximum time-to-live in DNS answer records

dns.dns_min_ttl.direction_semantics: Minimum TTL value from answer records
dns.dns_min_ttl.description: Minimum time-to-live in DNS answer records

dns.dns_query_type_str.direction_semantics: String representation of DNS query type
dns.dns_query_type_str.description: DNS query type string (A, AAAA, CNAME, etc.)

dns.dns_recursion_available.direction_semantics: Whether recursion is available on server

dns.dns_response_code.description: DNS response code (-1 if no response)

dns.dns_response_code_str.direction_semantics: String representation of DNS response code
dns.dns_response_code_str.description: DNS response code string (NOERROR, NXDOMAIN, etc.)

dns.dns_truncated.direction_semantics: Whether the DNS message was truncated

entropy.entropy_initiator.description: Shannon entropy of forward direction payload

entropy.entropy_payload.direction_semantics: Shannon entropy of combined payload bytes
entropy.entropy_payload.description: Shannon entropy of payload (0-8 bits per byte)

entropy.entropy_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of initiator to responder entropy

entropy.entropy_responder.description: Shannon entropy of backward direction payload

entropy.high_byte_ratio.description: Ratio of high bytes (>=0x80) in payload

entropy.null_ratio.description: Ratio of null (0x00) bytes in payload

entropy.payload_bytes_sampled.description: Total bytes sampled for entropy analysis

entropy.printable_ratio.description: Ratio of printable ASCII characters in payload

fingerprint.doh_confidence.description: Confidence score (0-1) for DoH traffic detection

fingerprint.likely_doh.description: Whether flow is likely DNS over HTTPS traffic

fingerprint.likely_tor.description: Whether flow is likely Tor traffic based on packet patterns

fingerprint.likely_vpn.description: Whether flow is likely VPN traffic based on protocol patterns

fingerprint.tor_confidence.description: Confidence score (0-1) for Tor traffic detection

fingerprint.traffic_type.description: Traffic type classification (tor, vpn:*, doh, encrypted, unknown)

fingerprint.vpn_confidence.description: Confidence score (0-1) for VPN traffic detection

fingerprint.vpn_type.description: VPN type if detected (openvpn, wireguard, ipsec-esp, ipsec-ah, ipsec-ike, l2tp)

flow_meta.bytes_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of fwd to bwd bytes

flow_meta.duration.direction_semantics: Time between first and last packet

flow_meta.end_time.description: Unix timestamp of last packet in flow

flow_meta.packets_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of fwd to bwd packets

flow_meta.start_time.description: Unix timestamp of first packet in flow

flow_meta.total_packets.description: Total number of packets in flow

http2.http2_data_frames.direction_semantics: HTTP/2 DATA frames in both directions

http2.http2_detected.description: Whether HTTP/2 protocol was detected in flow

http2.http2_frame_count.direction_semantics: Total HTTP/2 frames in both directions
http2.http2_frame_count.description: Total number of HTTP/2 frames observed

http2.http2_goaway_frames.direction_semantics: HTTP/2 GOAWAY frames in both directions

http2.http2_headers_frames.direction_semantics: HTTP/2 HEADERS frames in both directions

http2.http2_multiplexed.direction_semantics: Multiple streams detected in bidirectional flow
http2.http2_multiplexed.description: Whether HTTP/2 stream multiplexing was detected

http2.http2_preface_seen.description: Whether HTTP/2 connection preface (client magic) was seen

http2.http2_push_promise_frames.description: Number of HTTP/2 PUSH_PROMISE frames (server push)

http2.http2_server_push.description: Whether HTTP/2 server push was detected

http2.http2_settings_frames.direction_semantics: HTTP/2 SETTINGS frames in both directions

http2.http2_streams_estimate.direction_semantics: Estimated HTTP/2 streams in both directions
http2.http2_streams_estimate.description: Estimated number of HTTP/2 streams (unique stream IDs)

http2.http2_window_update_frames.direction_semantics: HTTP/2 WINDOW_UPDATE frames in both directions
http2.http2_window_update_frames.description: Number of HTTP/2 WINDOW_UPDATE frames (flow control)

http2.http3_detected.description: Whether HTTP/3 (QUIC-based) protocol was detected in flow

icmp.icmp_dest_unreachable_count.description: Number of ICMP destination unreachable packets (type 3)

icmp.icmp_dominant_type.description: Most frequently occurring ICMP type in the flow (-1 if no ICMP)

icmp.icmp_dominant_type_count.direction_semantics: Count of most common ICMP type
icmp.icmp_dominant_type_count.description: Number of packets with the most common ICMP type

icmp.icmp_echo_reply_count.description: Number of ICMP echo reply packets (type 0)

icmp.icmp_echo_request_count.description: Number of ICMP echo request packets (type 8)

icmp.icmp_echo_success_ratio.description: Ratio of echo replies to echo requests (0 if no requests)

icmp.icmp_packet_count.description: Number of ICMP packets in the flow

icmp.icmp_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of ICMP packets to total
icmp.icmp_ratio.description: Ratio of ICMP packets to total packets in the flow

icmp.icmp_seq_gaps.description: Number of gaps in ICMP sequence numbers (non-sequential)

icmp.icmp_seq_max.description: Maximum ICMP sequence number observed in the flow

icmp.icmp_seq_min.description: Minimum ICMP sequence number observed in the flow

icmp.icmp_stat.description: ICMP status bitmap (bit 0: echo req, 1: echo reply, 2: dest unreach, 3: time exceeded, 4: redirect, 5: other)

icmp.icmp_time_exceeded_count.description: Number of ICMP time exceeded packets (type 11)

icmp.icmp_unique_ids.description: Number of unique ICMP identifiers (for tracking echo sessions)

icmp.icmp_unique_type_codes.description: Number of unique ICMP type/code combinations in the flow

icmp.is_icmp_only.description: Whether the flow consists entirely of ICMP packets (1 if true, 0 otherwise)

ip_df_count.description: Count of packets with Don't Fragment flag set

ip_df_ratio.description: Ratio of packets with Don't Fragment flag set

ip_dscp.description: Differentiated Services Code Point (top 6 bits of ToS)

ip_ecn.description: Explicit Congestion Notification (bottom 2 bits of ToS)

ip_flags.description: Aggregated IP flags bitmap across all packets

ip_id_gaps.description: Number of gaps in IP identification sequence

ip_tos_unique_count.description: Number of unique ToS values observed in the flow

ip_tos_value.description: Minimum Type of Service value observed in the flow

ip_ttl_bwd_changes.description: Number of unique TTL values minus one in backward direction

ip_ttl_bwd_max.description: Maximum TTL value in backward direction packets

ip_ttl_bwd_mean.description: Mean TTL value in backward direction packets

ip_ttl_bwd_min.description: Minimum TTL value in backward direction packets

ip_ttl_fwd_changes.description: Number of unique TTL values minus one in forward direction

ip_ttl_fwd_hops_est.description: Estimated number of hops based on TTL in forward direction

ip_ttl_fwd_initial_est.description: Estimated initial TTL value (64, 128, or 255) in forward direction

ip_ttl_fwd_max.description: Maximum TTL value in forward direction packets

ip_ttl_fwd_mean.description: Mean TTL value in forward direction packets

ip_ttl_fwd_min.description: Minimum TTL value in forward direction packets

ipv6_options.ipv4_packet_count.direction_semantics: Total IPv4 packets in both directions
ipv6_options.ipv4_packet_count.description: Number of IPv4 packets in the flow

ipv6_options.ipv6_flow_label_changes.description: Number of flow label changes (should be 0 normally)

ipv6_options.ipv6_flow_label_unique_coun.description: Number of unique IPv6 flow labels observed

ipv6_options.ipv6_packet_count.direction_semantics: Total IPv6 packets in both directions
ipv6_options.ipv6_packet_count.description: Number of IPv6 packets in the flow

ipv6_options.ipv6_ratio.description: Ratio of IPv6 to total packets (0.0 to 1.0)

ipv6_options.ipv6_traffic_class_unique_c.description: Number of unique traffic class values observed

ipv6_options.is_ipv6_only.description: 1 if flow contains only IPv6 packets, 0 otherwise

mac.mac_broadcast_count.description: Count of packets with broadcast destination MAC (ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff)

mac.mac_dst.direction_semantics: Destination MAC address from first packet
mac.mac_dst.description: Destination MAC address of flow responder

mac.mac_multicast_count.description: Count of packets with multicast destination MAC

mac.mac_src.direction_semantics: Source MAC address from first packet
mac.mac_src.description: Source MAC address of flow initiator

mac.mac_stat.description: MAC status bitmap (bit0=src, bit1=dst, bit2=multi-src, bit3=multi-dst, bit4=VLAN)

mac.mac_unique_dst_count.direction_semantics: Number of unique destination MACs observed
mac.mac_unique_dst_count.description: Count of unique destination MAC addresses in flow

mac.mac_unique_src_count.direction_semantics: Number of unique source MACs observed
mac.mac_unique_src_count.description: Count of unique source MAC addresses in flow

mac.mac_vlan_count.direction_semantics: Number of unique VLAN IDs observed
mac.mac_vlan_count.description: Count of unique VLAN IDs in flow

mac.mac_vlan_id.direction_semantics: Minimum VLAN ID observed in flow

padding.avg_burst_payload_efficiency.description: Average ratio of payload to total bytes per burst

padding.burst_overhead_bytes.description: Total header overhead bytes across all bursts

padding.burst_padding_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of overhead to total bytes in bursts

padding.dominant_size_mode.description: Mode (most frequent) packet size in bytes

padding.dominant_size_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of packets with dominant size
padding.dominant_size_ratio.description: Fraction of packets with the most common size

padding.iat_cv.description: Coefficient of variation (std/mean) of inter-arrival times

padding.is_constant_rate.description: True if IAT coefficient of variation is below threshold

padding.is_constant_size.description: True if dominant packet size ratio exceeds threshold

padding.is_tor_like.description: True if traffic has Tor-like characteristics

padding.pkt_size_cv.direction_semantics: Coefficient of variation of packet sizes
padding.pkt_size_cv.description: Coefficient of variation (std/mean) of packet sizes

padding.pkt_size_variance.direction_semantics: Variance of packet sizes in both directions

padding.size_entropy.description: Normalized entropy of packet size distribution

padding.tor_cell_count.description: Number of packets with Tor cell-like sizes (580-600 bytes)

padding.tor_cell_ratio.description: Fraction of packets with Tor cell-like sizes

padding.unique_size_count.description: Count of distinct packet sizes in flow

quic.quic_initial_packets.description: Number of QUIC Initial packets in flow

quic.quic_spin_bit.direction_semantics: Whether spin bit is in use
quic.quic_spin_bit.description: QUIC spin bit detection for RTT estimation

size.dominant_pkt_ratio.description: Ratio of packets with the dominant size

size.dominant_pkt_size.direction_semantics: Most common size from both directions
size.dominant_pkt_size.description: Most common packet size in the flow

size.header_only_ratio.description: Ratio of packets with no payload (header-only)

size.l7_bytes_bwd.direction_semantics: Payload bytes from responder to initiator
size.l7_bytes_bwd.description: Total Layer 7 (payload) bytes in backward direction

size.l7_bytes_fwd.direction_semantics: Payload bytes from initiator to responder
size.l7_bytes_fwd.description: Total Layer 7 (payload) bytes in forward direction

size.l7_bytes_total.direction_semantics: Total payload bytes from both directions

size.l7_pkt_max_bwd.direction_semantics: Max payload size from responder to initiator
size.l7_pkt_max_bwd.description: Maximum L7 packet size in backward direction

size.l7_pkt_max_fwd.direction_semantics: Max payload size from initiator to responder
size.l7_pkt_max_fwd.description: Maximum L7 packet size in forward direction

size.l7_pkt_min_bwd.direction_semantics: Min payload size from responder to initiator
size.l7_pkt_min_bwd.description: Minimum L7 packet size in backward direction

size.l7_pkt_min_fwd.direction_semantics: Min payload size from initiator to responder
size.l7_pkt_min_fwd.description: Minimum L7 packet size in forward direction

size.packets_with_payload.description: Number of packets with non-zero payload

size.packets_with_payload_bwd.description: Number of backward packets with non-zero payload

size.packets_with_payload_fwd.description: Number of forward packets with non-zero payload

size.payload_len_bwd_std.description: Standard deviation of backward payload length

size.payload_len_fwd_std.description: Standard deviation of forward payload length

size.pkt_len_bwd_std.description: Standard deviation of backward packet length

size.pkt_len_fwd_std.description: Standard deviation of forward packet length

ssh.ssh_client_software.description: SSH client software name from banner

ssh.ssh_client_version.description: SSH protocol version advertised by client

ssh.ssh_encrypted_packets.description: Number of encrypted packets after NEWKEYS

ssh.ssh_hassh.description: MD5 hash of client KEXINIT parameters

ssh.ssh_hassh_server.description: MD5 hash of server KEXINIT parameters

ssh.ssh_kex_packets.description: Number of SSH key exchange packets

ssh.ssh_server_software.description: SSH server software name from banner

ssh.ssh_server_version.description: SSH protocol version advertised by server

tcp.ack_count.direction_semantics: Count of ACK packets in entire flow
tcp.ack_count.description: Number of TCP packets with ACK flag set

tcp.ack_only_packets.direction_semantics: Count of ACK-only packets in entire flow
tcp.ack_only_packets.description: Number of TCP packets with only ACK flag and no payload

tcp.complete_handshake.direction_semantics: True if SYN from initiator and SYN-ACK from responder observed
tcp.complete_handshake.description: Whether a complete TCP handshake was observed

tcp.cwr_count.direction_semantics: Count of CWR packets in entire flow
tcp.cwr_count.description: Number of TCP packets with CWR flag set

tcp.data_packets.direction_semantics: Count of packets with payload in entire flow
tcp.data_packets.description: Number of TCP packets with non-zero payload

tcp.ece_count.direction_semantics: Count of ECE packets in entire flow
tcp.ece_count.description: Number of TCP packets with ECE flag set

tcp.fin_count.direction_semantics: Count of FIN packets in entire flow

tcp.fin_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of FIN packets to total packets
tcp.fin_ratio.description: Ratio of FIN packets to total packets

tcp.flags_agg.direction_semantics: OR of all TCP flags seen in flow
tcp.flags_agg.description: Aggregate TCP flags (OR of all flags seen in flow)

tcp.flags_anomaly.direction_semantics: True if anomalous flag combinations detected
tcp.flags_anomaly.description: Whether anomalous TCP flag combinations were detected (null scan, xmas tree, etc.)

tcp.flags_bwd.direction_semantics: OR of all TCP flags from responder
tcp.flags_bwd.description: Aggregate TCP flags from backward direction (responder to initiator)

tcp.flags_fwd.direction_semantics: OR of all TCP flags from initiator
tcp.flags_fwd.description: Aggregate TCP flags from forward direction (initiator to responder)

tcp.graceful_close.direction_semantics: True if FIN seen from both directions
tcp.graceful_close.description: Whether the connection closed gracefully with FIN from both sides

tcp.initiator_syn.description: Whether the flow initiator sent a SYN packet

tcp.is_tcp.direction_semantics: True if flow uses TCP protocol
tcp.is_tcp.description: Whether the flow is a TCP flow

tcp.psh_count.direction_semantics: Count of PSH packets in entire flow
tcp.psh_count.description: Number of TCP packets with PSH flag set

tcp.psh_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of PSH packets to total packets
tcp.psh_ratio.description: Ratio of PSH packets to total packets

tcp.reset_close.direction_semantics: True if any RST packet observed
tcp.reset_close.description: Whether the connection was closed with a RST

tcp.responder_synack.description: Whether the flow responder sent a SYN-ACK packet

tcp.rst_count.direction_semantics: Count of RST packets in entire flow

tcp.rst_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of RST packets to total packets
tcp.rst_ratio.description: Ratio of RST packets to total packets

tcp.syn_count.direction_semantics: Count of SYN packets in entire flow
tcp.syn_count.description: Number of TCP SYN packets (without ACK)

tcp.syn_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of SYN+SYN-ACK packets to total packets
tcp.syn_ratio.description: Ratio of SYN and SYN-ACK packets to total packets

tcp.synack_count.direction_semantics: Count of SYN-ACK packets in entire flow

tcp.urg_count.direction_semantics: Count of URG packets in entire flow
tcp.urg_count.description: Number of TCP packets with URG flag set

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd.direction_semantics: JA4T-style TCP fingerprint from backward SYN-ACK packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd.description: JA4T-style TCP fingerprint for backward direction (from SYN-ACK)

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_mss.direction_semantics: TCP MSS option from backward SYN-ACK packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_mss.description: TCP Maximum Segment Size from backward SYN-ACK packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_ttl.direction_semantics: IP TTL from backward SYN-ACK packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_ttl.description: IP TTL value from backward SYN-ACK packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_window.direction_semantics: TCP window size from backward SYN-ACK packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_window.description: TCP window size from backward SYN-ACK packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_ws.direction_semantics: TCP window scale option from backward SYN-ACK packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_bwd_ws.description: TCP window scale factor from backward SYN-ACK packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd.direction_semantics: JA4T-style TCP fingerprint from forward SYN packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd.description: JA4T-style TCP fingerprint for forward direction (from SYN)

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_mss.direction_semantics: TCP MSS option from forward SYN packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_mss.description: TCP Maximum Segment Size from forward SYN packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_ttl.direction_semantics: IP TTL from forward SYN packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_ttl.description: IP TTL value from forward SYN packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_window.direction_semantics: TCP window size from forward SYN packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_window.description: TCP window size from forward SYN packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_ws.direction_semantics: TCP window scale option from forward SYN packet
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_fp_fwd_ws.description: TCP window scale factor from forward SYN packet

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_os_hint_bwd.direction_semantics: OS guess based on backward SYN-ACK TCP parameters
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_os_hint_bwd.description: Operating system hint inferred from backward TCP parameters

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_os_hint_fwd.direction_semantics: OS guess based on forward SYN TCP parameters
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_os_hint_fwd.description: Operating system hint inferred from forward TCP parameters

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_uptime_bwd.direction_semantics: Estimated uptime of backward host from TCP timestamps
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_uptime_bwd.description: Estimated uptime of responder host in hours (from TCP timestamps)

tcp_fingerprint.tcp_uptime_fwd.direction_semantics: Estimated uptime of forward host from TCP timestamps
tcp_fingerprint.tcp_uptime_fwd.description: Estimated uptime of initiator host in hours (from TCP timestamps)

tcp_mptcp.capable_bwd.direction_semantics: 1 if MP_CAPABLE seen in backward SYN
tcp_mptcp.capable_bwd.description: Whether MP_CAPABLE was seen in backward direction SYN packet

tcp_mptcp.capable_fwd.direction_semantics: 1 if MP_CAPABLE seen in forward SYN
tcp_mptcp.capable_fwd.description: Whether MP_CAPABLE was seen in forward direction SYN packet

tcp_mptcp.detected.direction_semantics: 1 if any MPTCP option detected in flow
tcp_mptcp.detected.description: Whether MPTCP option (kind 30) was detected in any packet

tcp_mptcp.is_mptcp.description: Whether this is a full MPTCP session (both directions capable)

tcp_mptcp.option_count.direction_semantics: Count of packets containing MPTCP options
tcp_mptcp.option_count.description: Number of packets containing MPTCP TCP option (kind 30)

tcp_mptcp.stat.description: MPTCP status bitmap encoding detection and capability flags

tcp_options.mss_bwd.description: Maximum Segment Size advertised by the backward direction (responder)

tcp_options.mss_fwd.description: Maximum Segment Size advertised by the forward direction (initiator)

tcp_options.options_bitmap.direction_semantics: Bitmap of TCP options present in flow
tcp_options.options_bitmap.description: Bitmap indicating which TCP options are present (bit 0: MSS, bit 1: Window Scale, bit 2: SACK permitted, bit 3: Timestamps)

tcp_options.options_pkt_count.direction_semantics: Count of packets with any TCP options
tcp_options.options_pkt_count.description: Number of packets in the flow that contain TCP options

tcp_options.sack_blocks_total.direction_semantics: Total SACK blocks across all packets in flow
tcp_options.sack_blocks_total.description: Total number of SACK blocks seen in the entire flow

tcp_options.sack_permitted_bwd.direction_semantics: 1 if SACK permitted by responder, 0 otherwise
tcp_options.sack_permitted_bwd.description: Whether SACK (Selective Acknowledgment) was permitted by the backward direction

tcp_options.sack_permitted_fwd.direction_semantics: 1 if SACK permitted by initiator, 0 otherwise
tcp_options.sack_permitted_fwd.description: Whether SACK (Selective Acknowledgment) was permitted by the forward direction

tcp_options.ts_bwd_diff.direction_semantics: Difference between last and first timestamp from responder
tcp_options.ts_bwd_diff.description: Difference between first and last TCP timestamp in backward direction (useful for uptime estimation)

tcp_options.ts_bwd_first.description: First TCP timestamp value seen in the backward direction

tcp_options.ts_bwd_last.description: Last TCP timestamp value seen in the backward direction

tcp_options.ts_bwd_present.direction_semantics: 1 if timestamps present in backward direction, 0 otherwise
tcp_options.ts_bwd_present.description: Whether TCP timestamps were present in the backward direction

tcp_options.ts_ecr_bwd_first.direction_semantics: First echo reply timestamp from responder
tcp_options.ts_ecr_bwd_first.description: First TCP timestamp echo reply value in the backward direction

tcp_options.ts_ecr_fwd_first.direction_semantics: First echo reply timestamp from initiator
tcp_options.ts_ecr_fwd_first.description: First TCP timestamp echo reply value in the forward direction

tcp_options.ts_fwd_diff.direction_semantics: Difference between last and first timestamp from initiator
tcp_options.ts_fwd_diff.description: Difference between first and last TCP timestamp in forward direction (useful for uptime estimation)

tcp_options.ts_fwd_first.description: First TCP timestamp value seen in the forward direction

tcp_options.ts_fwd_last.description: Last TCP timestamp value seen in the forward direction

tcp_options.ts_fwd_present.direction_semantics: 1 if timestamps present in forward direction, 0 otherwise
tcp_options.ts_fwd_present.description: Whether TCP timestamps were present in the forward direction

tcp_options.ws_bwd.description: TCP window scale factor advertised by the backward direction (responder)

tcp_options.ws_fwd.description: TCP window scale factor advertised by the forward direction (initiator)

tcp_rtt.ack_max.description: Maximum round-trip time from data packet to ACK timing

tcp_rtt.ack_mean.description: Mean round-trip time from data packet to ACK timing

tcp_rtt.ack_min.description: Minimum round-trip time from data packet to ACK timing

tcp_rtt.handshake.description: Round-trip time estimated from TCP handshake (SYN -> SYN-ACK -> ACK)

tcp_rtt.jitter_avg.direction_semantics: Average absolute difference between consecutive RTT samples
tcp_rtt.jitter_avg.description: Average RTT jitter (variation between consecutive samples)

tcp_rtt.max.direction_semantics: Maximum RTT observed from timestamp echoes
tcp_rtt.max.description: Maximum round-trip time from TCP timestamp echo replies

tcp_rtt.mean.description: Mean round-trip time from TCP timestamp echo replies

tcp_rtt.min.direction_semantics: Minimum RTT observed from timestamp echoes
tcp_rtt.min.description: Minimum round-trip time from TCP timestamp echo replies

tcp_rtt.samples.description: Number of RTT samples from TCP timestamp echo replies

tcp_sequence.tcp_ack_bwd_count.description: Number of ACK packets in backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_ack_bwd_dup.description: Number of duplicate ACK packets in backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_ack_fwd_count.description: Number of ACK packets in forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_ack_fwd_dup.description: Number of duplicate ACK packets in forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_isn_bwd.description: Initial sequence number for backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_isn_fwd.description: Initial sequence number for forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_retrans_ratio.description: Ratio of retransmitted packets to total data packets

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_bwd_bytes_sent.description: Total bytes sent in backward direction based on sequence analysis

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_bwd_gaps.description: Number of sequence number gaps in backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_bwd_ooo.description: Number of out-of-order packets in backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_bwd_retrans.description: Number of retransmitted packets in backward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_fwd_bytes_sent.description: Total bytes sent in forward direction based on sequence analysis

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_fwd_gaps.description: Number of sequence number gaps in forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_fwd_ooo.description: Number of out-of-order packets in forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_seq_fwd_retrans.description: Number of retransmitted packets in forward direction

tcp_sequence.tcp_total_dup_acks.description: Total number of duplicate ACK packets in both directions

tcp_sequence.tcp_total_ooo.description: Total number of out-of-order packets in both directions

tcp_sequence.tcp_total_retrans.description: Total number of retransmitted packets in both directions

tcp_window.init_win_bwd.direction_semantics: Initial TCP window size from responder
tcp_window.init_win_bwd.description: Initial TCP window size advertised by the flow responder

tcp_window.init_win_fwd.direction_semantics: Initial TCP window size from initiator
tcp_window.init_win_fwd.description: Initial TCP window size advertised by the flow initiator

tcp_window.scaled_win_bwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum scaled TCP window size from responder
tcp_window.scaled_win_bwd_max.description: Maximum TCP window size with scale factor applied from the flow responder

tcp_window.scaled_win_fwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum scaled TCP window size from initiator
tcp_window.scaled_win_fwd_max.description: Maximum TCP window size with scale factor applied from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_bwd_change_count.direction_semantics: Total count of window size changes from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_change_count.description: Total number of window size changes from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_down_count.direction_semantics: Count of window size decreases from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_down_count.description: Number of times window size decreased from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum TCP window size from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_max.description: Maximum TCP window size observed from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_mean.direction_semantics: Mean TCP window size from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_mean.description: Mean TCP window size observed from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_min.direction_semantics: Minimum TCP window size from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_min.description: Minimum TCP window size observed from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_up_count.direction_semantics: Count of window size increases from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_up_count.description: Number of times window size increased from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_bwd_zero_count.direction_semantics: Count of zero window packets from responder
tcp_window.win_bwd_zero_count.description: Number of packets with zero window size from the flow responder

tcp_window.win_fwd_change_count.direction_semantics: Total count of window size changes from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_change_count.description: Total number of window size changes from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_down_count.direction_semantics: Count of window size decreases from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_down_count.description: Number of times window size decreased from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum TCP window size from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_max.description: Maximum TCP window size observed from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_mean.direction_semantics: Mean TCP window size from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_mean.description: Mean TCP window size observed from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_min.direction_semantics: Minimum TCP window size from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_min.description: Minimum TCP window size observed from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_up_count.direction_semantics: Count of window size increases from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_up_count.description: Number of times window size increased from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_fwd_zero_count.direction_semantics: Count of zero window packets from initiator
tcp_window.win_fwd_zero_count.description: Number of packets with zero window size from the flow initiator

tcp_window.win_scale_bwd.direction_semantics: TCP window scale factor from responder
tcp_window.win_scale_bwd.description: TCP window scale factor advertised by the flow responder

tcp_window.win_scale_fwd.direction_semantics: TCP window scale factor from initiator
tcp_window.win_scale_fwd.description: TCP window scale factor advertised by the flow initiator

tcp_window.zero_win_ratio.direction_semantics: Ratio of zero window packets to total window packets
tcp_window.zero_win_ratio.description: Ratio of zero window packets to total packets with window information

timing.avg_burst_duration.description: Average duration of a burst in seconds

timing.avg_burst_packets.direction_semantics: Average packets per burst across flow
timing.avg_burst_packets.description: Average number of packets per burst

timing.avg_idle_duration.description: Average duration of idle periods in seconds

timing.burst_count.direction_semantics: Number of bursts across entire flow

timing.burstiness_index.direction_semantics: Coefficient of variation of IATs for entire flow
timing.burstiness_index.description: Burstiness index (coefficient of variation of IATs)

timing.burstiness_index_bwd.direction_semantics: Coefficient of variation of backward IATs

timing.burstiness_index_fwd.direction_semantics: Coefficient of variation of forward IATs

timing.first_response_time.direction_semantics: Time from flow start to first responder packet
timing.first_response_time.description: Time to first response from responder

timing.iat_bwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum IAT in backward direction only

timing.iat_bwd_mean.direction_semantics: Mean IAT in backward direction only

timing.iat_bwd_median.direction_semantics: Median IAT in backward direction only

timing.iat_bwd_min.direction_semantics: Minimum IAT in backward direction only

timing.iat_bwd_std.direction_semantics: Standard deviation of IAT in backward direction
timing.iat_bwd_std.description: Standard deviation of backward direction inter-arrival times

timing.iat_fwd_max.direction_semantics: Maximum IAT in forward direction only

timing.iat_fwd_mean.direction_semantics: Mean IAT in forward direction only

timing.iat_fwd_median.direction_semantics: Median IAT in forward direction only

timing.iat_fwd_min.direction_semantics: Minimum IAT in forward direction only

timing.iat_fwd_std.direction_semantics: Standard deviation of IAT in forward direction
timing.iat_fwd_std.description: Standard deviation of forward direction inter-arrival times

timing.iat_max.direction_semantics: Maximum IAT across all packets in flow
timing.iat_max.description: Maximum inter-arrival time between consecutive packets

timing.iat_mean.direction_semantics: Mean IAT across all packets in flow
timing.iat_mean.description: Mean inter-arrival time between consecutive packets

timing.iat_median.direction_semantics: Median IAT across all packets in flow
timing.iat_median.description: Median inter-arrival time between consecutive packets

timing.iat_min.direction_semantics: Minimum IAT across all packets in flow
timing.iat_min.description: Minimum inter-arrival time between consecutive packets

timing.iat_std.direction_semantics: Standard deviation of IAT across all packets

timing.iat_sum.direction_semantics: Sum of all IATs (approximately flow duration)

timing.idle_count.direction_semantics: Number of idle periods across flow
timing.idle_count.description: Number of detected idle periods between bursts

timing.max_burst_packets.direction_semantics: Maximum packets in any single burst
timing.max_burst_packets.description: Maximum number of packets in a single burst

timing.max_idle_duration.description: Maximum idle period duration in seconds

tls.ja3_hash.description: JA3 hash fingerprint of TLS ClientHello

tls.ja3s_hash.description: JA3S hash fingerprint of TLS ServerHello

tls.tls_cert_count.description: Number of certificates in server Certificate message

tls.tls_cert_total_length.description: Total length of all certificates in bytes

tls.tls_cipher_count.description: Number of cipher suites in ClientHello

tls.tls_detected.description: Whether TLS handshake was detected in flow

tls.tls_early_data_ext.description: Whether early data extension was present (TLS 1.3)

tls.tls_extension_count.description: Number of TLS extensions in ClientHello

tls.tls_handshake_packets.direction_semantics: TLS handshake packets in both directions

tls.tls_key_exchange_group.description: Named group ID for key exchange (e.g., x25519)

tls.tls_key_exchange_length.description: Key exchange public key length in bits

tls.tls_session_id_len.description: Length of session ID in ClientHello

tls.tls_session_ticket_ext.direction_semantics: Session ticket extension present in ClientHello
tls.tls_session_ticket_ext.description: Whether session ticket extension was present
